verses.verse: And<WG1161> it came to pass<WG1096>, that, as<WG1722> the people<WG3793> pressed upon<WG1945> him<WG846> to hear<WG191> the word<WG3056> of God<WG2316><WG2532>, he<WG846> stood<WG2258><WG2476> by<WG3844> the lake<WG3041> of Gennesaret<WG1082>,

And<WG2532> saw<WG1492> two<WG1417> ships<WG4143> standing<WG2476> by<WG3844> the lake<WG3041>: but<WG1161> the fishermen<WG231> were gone<WG576> out of<WG575> them<WG846>, and were washing<WG637> their nets<WG1350>.

And<WG1161> he entered<WG1684> into<WG1519> one<WG1520> of the ships<WG4143>, which<WG3739> was<WG2258> Simon's<WG4613>, and prayed<WG2065> him<WG846> that he would thrust out<WG1877> a little<WG3641> from<WG575> the land<WG1093>. And<WG2532> he sat down<WG2523>, and taught<WG1321> the people<WG3793> out of<WG1537> the ship<WG4143>.

Now<WG1161> when<WG5613> he had left<WG3973> speaking<WG2980>, he said<WG2036> unto<WG4314> Simon<WG4613>, Launch out <WG1877> into <WG1519> the deep <WG899> , and <WG2532> let down <WG5465> your <WG5216> nets <WG1350> for <WG1519> a draught <WG61> .

And<WG2532> Simon<WG4613> answering<WG611> said<WG2036> unto him<WG846>, Master<WG1988>, we have toiled<WG2872> all<WG3650><WG1223> the night<WG3571>, and have taken<WG2983> nothing<WG3762>: nevertheless<WG1161> at<WG1909> thy<WG4675> word<WG4487> I will let down<WG5465> the net<WG1350>.
And<WG2532> when they had<WG4160> this<WG5124> done<WG4160>, they inclosed<WG4788> a great<WG4183> multitude<WG4128> of fishes<WG2486>: and<WG1161> their<WG846> net<WG1350> brake<WG1284>.

And<WG2532> they beckoned<WG2656> unto their partners<WG3353>, which<WG3588> were in<WG1722> the other<WG2087> ship<WG4143>, that they should come<WG2064> and help<WG4815> them<WG846>. And<WG2532> they came<WG2064>, and<WG2532> filled<WG4130> both<WG297> the ships<WG4143>, so<WG5620> that they<WG846> began to sink<WG1036>.

When<WG1161> Simon<WG4613> Peter<WG4074> saw<WG1492> it, he fell down at<WG4363> Jesus'<WG2424> knees<WG1119>, saying<WG3004>, Depart<WG1831> from<WG575> me<WG1700>; for<WG3754> I am<WG1510> a sinful<WG268> man<WG435>, O Lord<WG2962>.

For<WG1063> he<WG846> was astonished<WG4023><WG2285>, and<WG2532> all<WG3956> that were<WG4862> with him<WG846>, at<WG1909> the draught<WG61> of the fishes<WG2486> which<WG3739> they had taken<WG4815>:

And<WG1161> so<WG3668> was also<WG2532> James<WG2385>, and<WG2532> John<WG2491>, the sons<WG5207> of Zebedee<WG2199>, which<WG3739> were<WG2258> partners<WG2844> with Simon<WG4613>. And<WG2532> Jesus<WG2424> said<WG2036> unto<WG4314> Simon<WG4613>, Fear <WG5399> not <WG3361> ; from <WG575> henceforth <WG3568> thou shalt <WG2071> catch <WG2221> men <WG444> .
And<WG2532> when they had brought<WG2609> their ships<WG4143> to<WG1909> land<WG1093>, they forsook<WG863> all<WG537>, and followed<WG190> him<WG846>.

¶ And<WG2532> it came to pass<WG1096>, when he<WG846> was<WG1511><WG1722> in<WG1722> a certain<WG3391> city<WG4172><WG2532>, behold<WG2400> a man<WG435> full<WG4134> of leprosy<WG3014>: who<WG2532> seeing<WG1492> Jesus<WG2424> fell<WG4098> on<WG1909> his face<WG4383>, and besought<WG1189> him<WG846>, saying<WG3004>, Lord<WG2962>, if<WG1437> thou wilt<WG2309>, thou canst<WG1410> make<WG2511> me<WG3165> clean<WG2511>.

And<WG2532> he put forth<WG1614> his hand<WG5495>, and touched<WG680> him<WG846>, saying<WG2036>, I will <WG2309> : be thou clean <WG2511> . And<WG2532> immediately<WG2112> the leprosy<WG3014> departed<WG565> from<WG575> him<WG846>.

And<WG2532> he<WG846> charged<WG3853> him<WG846> to tell <WG2036> no man <WG3367> : but <WG235> go <WG565> , and shew <WG1166> thyself <WG4572> to the priest <WG2409> , and <WG2532> offer <WG4374> for <WG4012> thy <WG4675> cleansing <WG2512> , according as <WG2531> Moses <WG3475> commanded <WG4367> , for <WG1519> a testimony <WG3142> unto them <WG846> .

But<WG1161> so much the more<WG3123> went there<WG1330> a fame<WG3056> abroad<WG1330> of<WG4012> him<WG846>: and<WG2532> great<WG4183> multitudes<WG3793> came together<WG4905> to hear<WG191>, and<WG2532> to be healed<WG2323> by<WG5259> him<WG846> of<WG575> their<WG846> infirmities<WG769>.
¶ And<WG1161> he withdrew<WG2258><WG5298> himself<WG846> into<WG1722> the wilderness<WG2048>, and<WG2532> prayed<WG4336>.

And<WG2532> it came to pass<WG1096> on<WG1722> a certain<WG3391> day<WG2250>, as<WG2532> he<WG846> was<WG2258> teaching<WG1321>, that<WG2532> there were<WG2258> Pharisees<WG5330> and<WG2532> doctors of the law<WG3547> sitting by<WG2521>, which<WG3739> were<WG2258> come<WG2064> out of<WG1537> every<WG3956> town<WG2968> of Galilee<WG1056>, and<WG2532> Judaea<WG2449>, and<WG2532> Jerusalem<WG2419>: and<WG2532> the power<WG1411> of the Lord<WG2962> was<WG2258> present to<WG1519> heal<WG2390> them<WG846>.

¶ And<WG2532>, behold<WG2400>, men<WG435> brought<WG5342> in<WG1909> a bed<WG2825> a man<WG444> which<WG3739> was<WG2258> taken with a palsy<WG3886>: and<WG2532> they sought<WG2212> means to bring<WG1533> him<WG846> in<WG1533>, and<WG2532> to lay<WG5087> him before<WG1799> him<WG846>.

And<WG2532> when they could<WG2147> not<WG3361> find<WG2147> by<WG1223> what<WG4169> way they might bring<WG1533> him<WG846> in<WG1533> because<WG1223> of the multitude<WG3793>, they went<WG305> upon<WG1909> the housetop<WG1430>, and let<WG2524> him<WG846> down<WG2524> through<WG1223> the tiling<WG2766> with<WG4862> his couch<WG2826> into<WG1519> the midst<WG3319> before<WG1715> Jesus<WG2424>.
And<WG2532> when he saw<WG1492> their<WG846> faith<WG4102>, he said<WG2036> unto him<WG846>, Man <WG444> , thy <WG4675> sins <WG266> are forgiven <WG863> thee <WG4671> .

And<WG2532> the scribes<WG1122> and<WG2532> the Pharisees<WG5330> began<WG756> to reason<WG1260>, saying<WG3004>, Who<WG5101> is<WG2076> this<WG3778> which<WG3739> speaketh<WG2980> blasphemies<WG988>? Who<WG5101> can<WG1410> forgive<WG863> sins<WG266>, but<WG1508> God<WG2316> alone<WG3441>?

But<WG1161> when Jesus<WG2424> perceived<WG1921> their<WG846> thoughts<WG1261>, he answering<WG611> said<WG2036> unto<WG4314> them<WG846>, What <WG5101> reason ye <WG1260> in <WG1722> your <WG5216> hearts <WG2588> ?

Whether <WG5101> is <WG2076> easier <WG2123> , to say <WG2036> , Thy <WG4675> sins <WG266> be forgiven <WG863> thee <WG4671> ; or <WG2228> to say <WG2036> , Rise up <WG1453> and <WG2532> walk <WG4043> ?

But <WG1161> that <WG2443> ye may know <WG1492> that <WG3754> the Son <WG5207> of man <WG444> hath <WG2192> power <WG1849> upon <WG1909> earth <WG1093> to forgive <WG863> sins <WG266> , (he said<WG2036> unto the sick of the palsy<WG3886>,) I say <WG3004> unto thee <WG4671> , Arise <WG1453> , and <WG2532> take up <WG142> thy <WG4675> couch <WG2826> , and go <WG4198> into <WG1519> thine <WG4675> house <WG3624> .

And<WG2532> immediately<WG3916> he rose up<WG450> before<WG1799> them<WG846>, and took up<WG142> that whereon<WG1909><WG3739> he lay<WG2621>, and departed<WG565> to<WG1519> his own<WG846> house<WG3624>, glorifying<WG1392> God<WG2316>.

And<WG2532> they were<WG2983> all<WG537> amazed<WG1611>, and<WG2532> they glorified<WG1392> God<WG2316>, and<WG2532> were filled<WG4130> with fear<WG5401>, saying<WG3004><WG3754>, We have seen<WG1492> strange things<WG3861> to day<WG4594>.

¶ And<WG2532> after<WG3326> these things<WG5023> he went forth<WG1831>, and<WG2532> saw<WG2300> a publican<WG5057>, named<WG3686> Levi<WG3018>, sitting<WG2521> at<WG1909> the receipt of custom<WG5058>: and<WG2532> he said<WG2036> unto him<WG846>, Follow <WG190> me <WG3427> .
And<WG2532> he left<WG2641> all<WG537>, rose up<WG450>, and followed<WG190> him<WG846>.

And<WG2532> Levi<WG3018> made<WG4160> him<WG846> a great<WG3173> feast<WG1403> in<WG1722> his own<WG846> house<WG3614>: and<WG2532> there was<WG2258> a great<WG4183> company<WG3793> of publicans<WG5057> and<WG2532> of others<WG243> that<WG3739> sat down<WG2258><WG2621> with<WG3326> them<WG846>.

But<WG2532> their<WG846> scribes<WG1122> and<WG2532> Pharisees<WG5330> murmured<WG1111> against<WG4314> his<WG846> disciples<WG3101>, saying<WG3004>, Why<WG1302> do ye eat<WG2068> and<WG2532> drink<WG4095> with<WG3326> publicans<WG5057> and<WG2532> sinners<WG268>?

And<WG2532> Jesus<WG2424> answering<WG611> said<WG2036> unto<WG4314> them<WG846>, They that are whole <WG5198> need <WG5532><WG2192> not <WG3756> a physician <WG2395> ; but <WG235> they that are <WG2192> sick <WG2560> .
I came <WG2064> not <WG3756> to call <WG2564> the righteous <WG1342> , but <WG235> sinners <WG268> to <WG1519> repentance <WG3341> .

¶ And<WG1161> they said<WG2036> unto<WG4314> him<WG846>, Why<WG1302> do<WG3522> the disciples<WG3101> of John<WG2491> fast<WG3522> often<WG4437>, and<WG2532> make<WG4160> prayers<WG1162>, and<WG2532> likewise<WG3668> the disciples<WG3588> of the Pharisees<WG5330>; but<WG1161> thine<WG4674> eat<WG2068> and<WG2532> drink<WG4095>?

And<WG1161> he said<WG2036> unto<WG4314> them<WG846><WG3361>, Can ye <WG1410> make <WG4160> the children <WG5207> of the bridechamber <WG3567> fast <WG3522> , while <WG3739><WG1722> the bridegroom <WG3566> is <WG2076> with <WG3326> them <WG846> ?

But <WG1161> the days <WG2250> will come <WG2064> , when <WG3752><WG2532> the bridegroom <WG3566> shall be taken away <WG522> from <WG575> them <WG846> , and then <WG5119> shall they fast <WG3522> in <WG1722> those <WG1565> days <WG2250> .

¶ And<WG1161> he spake<WG3004> also<WG2532> a parable<WG3850> unto<WG4314> them<WG846><WG3754>; No man <WG3762> putteth <WG1911> a piece <WG1915> of a new <WG2537> garment <WG2440> upon <WG1909> an old <WG2440><WG3820> ; if otherwise, then <WG1490> both <WG2532> the new <WG2537> maketh a rent <WG4977> , and <WG2532> the piece <WG1915> that was taken out of <WG575> the new <WG2537> agreeth <WG4856> not <WG3756> with the old <WG3820> .

And <WG2532> no man <WG3762> putteth <WG906> new <WG3501> wine <WG3631> into <WG1519> old <WG3820> bottles <WG779> ; else <WG1490> the new <WG3501> wine <WG3631> will burst <WG4486> the bottles <WG779> , and <WG2532><WG846> be spilled <WG1632> , and <WG2532> the bottles <WG779> shall perish <WG622> .
But <WG235> new <WG3501> wine <WG3631> must be put <WG992> into <WG1519> new <WG2537> bottles <WG779> ; and <WG2532> both <WG297> are preserved <WG4933> .

No man <WG3762> also <WG2532> having drunk <WG4095> old <WG3820> wine straightway <WG2112> desireth <WG2309> new <WG3501> : for <WG1063> he saith <WG3004> , The old <WG3820> is <WG2076> better <WG5543> .
